reviewText: Wonderful animation.  Every character is drawn with power. Story line is full of twists and turns. Full of action, drama, sex and violence.
A fantastic anime, with an awesome story. A must have for any serious collector.

This is an amazing series with an imaginative re-telling of Alexander the Great, with highly stylized artwork. This comes from the same artist (Peter Chung) that brought us Aeon Flux. If you're a fan of that series or animation in general at all, i highly recommend getting this set.

If you know your world history of Alexander the Great, and The Republic by Plato, you will know every characture in this very original anime. I have never seen one done this was, but it is artisticly very different. Being a lover of philosopy and history, I found keeping the truth of the time in a otherworld creation very cool.

More for the thinker type people of our world.
Part of a great aneme series and i am glad to finally have it for real.
